description: Number of stable towers of 2 X 2 LEGO blocks.
references: Clifford A. Pickover, A Passion for Mathematics, Wiley, 2005; see p. 65.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
P. J. S. Watson, On "LEGO" towers, J. Rec. Math., 12 (No. 1, 1979-1980), 24-27.
links: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2098 (terms < 10^1000)
author: _Simon Plouffe_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
